setupTasks.name: Prepare Environment Variables
setupTasks.command: cp .env.example .env && npm run php artisan key:generate

setupTasks.name: Install Tools
setupTasks.command: npm run php artisan telescope:install && npm run php artisan vendor:publish -- --provider="Laravel\Pulse\PulseServiceProvider"

setupTasks.name: Create and Migrate Database
setupTasks.command: touch database/tools.sqlite && npm run php artisan migrate
